ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Standard)
ThingDef.description: Inside the Phase I helmet, a clone trooper had a life support system, a tracking device for monitoring troop movements, and a display screen, which was built into the helmet's viewplate.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Sergeant)
ThingDef.description: Phase I helmet with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Lieutenant)
ThingDef.description: Phase I helmet with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Captain)
ThingDef.description: Phase I helmet with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Commander)
ThingDef.description: Phase I helmet with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(ColdAssault)
ThingDef.description: offering temporary protection against the vacuum of space, and the body glove protected the clone from the extreme cold and heat.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Katarn-Class)
ThingDef.description: The helmet of the Katarn-class armor had a HUD or heads up display that consistently displayed tactical data such as the location and distance to the target.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Visor)
ThingDef.description: Phase I Helmet customized with Visor

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Rangefinder)
ThingDef.description: Phase I Helmet customized with Rangefinder

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(RiseRangefinder)
ThingDef.description: Phase I Helmet customized with Rangefinder

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Sonic)
ThingDef.description: Phase I Helmet customized with noise cancelling

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Pilot)
ThingDef.description: Phase I helmet, a clone trooper had a life support system, and tracking device for monitoring troop movements

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(HeavyGunner)
ThingDef.description: Special operations Phase 1 Helmet trained for heavy weapons

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(HeavyAssault)
ThingDef.description: Special operations Phase 1 Helmet trained for heavy assault tactics

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(Engineer)
ThingDef.description: Special operations Phase 1 Helmet trained for building construction

ThingDef.label: Phase I Helmet(ARF)
ThingDef.description: Special operations Phase 1 Helmet trained for advanced recon

ThingDef.label: BodyGlove V1 (Standard)
ThingDef.description: Form-fitting garment. Many types of armor, including the type worn by The clone troopers of the Galactic Republic, included an insulated, and sometimes airtight, body glove underneath the armor plating.Military and paramilitary combat groups.wore body gloves, as the garments allowed much freedom of motion. Additionally, body gloves were worn as clothing in and of themselves.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Armor(Standard)
ThingDef.description: The Phase I clone trooper armor consisted of twenty form-fitting plates of lightweight plastoid-alloy composite.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Armor(Sergeant)
ThingDef.description: Phase I armor with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers, which was considered beneficial for non-clones.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Armor(Lieutenant)
ThingDef.description: Phase I armor with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers, which was considered beneficial for non-clones.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Armor(Captain)
ThingDef.description: Phase I armor with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers, which was considered beneficial for non-clones.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Armor(Commander)
ThingDef.description: Phase I armor with splashes of color denoted the military ranks of clone trooper officers, which was considered beneficial for non-clones.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Armor(ColdAssault)
ThingDef.description: Specialized cold-assault gear to handle combat in frigid environments.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Armor(Katarn-Class)
ThingDef.description: This armor was more expensive and provided better protection than standard clone armor.

ThingDef.label: Phase I Gear(HeavyGunner)
ThingDef.description: Specialist Armor plates for in heavy gunners

ThingDef.label: Katarn Backpack(Standard)
ThingDef.description: The backpack featured specialized ammunition cartridges that held various types of ammo, and was reconfigurable for many different missions, such as an extra oxygen tank for aquatic and space-borne environments.

ThingDef.label: Katarn Backpack(Heavy)
ThingDef.description: The backpack featured specialized ammunition cartridges that held various types of ammo, and was reconfigurable for many different missions, such as an extra oxygen tank for aquatic and space-borne environments.
